alert.note: Alert for South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 2:14PM MST until January 30 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snowfall accumulations of 4 to 8 inches possible over multiple waves. * WHERE...South Laramie Range and adjacent Foothills including Interstate 80 between Laramie and Cheyenne. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Monday. A lull in snowfall is expected overnight tonight, with snow increasing again on Sunday afternoon and continuing through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions due to icy, snow packed roads and reduced visibilities in falling and blowing snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
